message.body: Great! Trying to pump out a paper on Edwin Gordon's music learning theory. Hows it going with you?

Sounds interesting! How is it going so far? I'm good! Really busy at school and finishing apps for grad school and festivals. Also have a lot of papers but over all really good! Going to see La Boheme on Friday! You should come visit!
Sweet. I'll be up in NY at the end of the month before i fly out to Israel
Israel? Did you tell me about this before?
